title: Sunny Spacious Loft on Beautiful Park Ave (Garage Parking Inc.)
posting_body: Extra large, sunny and spacious loft studio designed by architect David Baker, in historic warehouse on Park Avenue in Emeryville.
•	Third floor apartment with no upstairs neighbors, overlooking spectacular courtyard and 5 story high fountain.
•	Floor to ceiling windows, vaulted ceiling, loft space for storage.
•	Kitchen includes induction stove and full sized dishwasher; all appliances less than 2 years old.
•	Includes covered garage parking with EV charging (one vehicle), and has plenty of street parking.
•	 Communal rooftop patio with views of Downtown Oakland and Bay Bridge.
•	Immaculately maintained with on-site property manager and staff present during normal business hours.

•	Located in the heart of Emeryville's Park Avenue District, within walking distance to Bay Street shops and restaurants, Target, Home Depot, Best Buy, IKEA, Emeryville Public Market, and next door to the Emery, Emeryville's largest residential/commercial development slated to open fall of 2022.
•	Easy, convenient access to the Bay Bridge, 580, and 880 freeways.
•	Landlord pays garbage, water, building maintenance
•	No pets, no smoking, and no subletting, please.
Please provide a brief introduction about yourself when inquiring such as career, desired length of stay, etc.
